content.query:
CREATE CREDENTIAL [cosmos_ivsaccount]
 WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
 SECRET = 'exU9Lv....................................=='
 GO

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(​PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=ivsaccount;Database=AdventureWorks',
                OBJECT = 'Sales',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'cosmos_ivsaccount'
) AS [Sales]


 SELECT orderdate,
        COUNT(id) AS ordercount
 FROM OPENROWSET(​PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                 CONNECTION = 'Account=ivsaccount;Database=AdventureWorks',
                 OBJECT = 'Sales',
                 SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'cosmos_ivsaccount'
 ) AS [Sales]
 GROUP BY orderdate
 ORDER BY orderdate;
